1.name: MOP Selection
1.description: MOP will be set as BOOK

2.name: MOP Selection
2.description: MOP will be set as [Domestic Clearing]

3.name: MOP Selection
3.description: MOP will be set as EURO1

4.name: MOP Selection
4.description: MOP will be set as TARGET2

5.name: MOP Selection
5.description: MOP will be set as CHAPS

6.name: MOP Selection
6.description: MOP will be set as SWIFT

7.name: MT selection
7.description: GPP will covert the Orig Message Type to the selected MOP"s required format

8.name: MOP accepted VD
8.description: The MOP will be considered as a valid candidate for this transaction (other parameters will be assessed too as part of MOP selection process)

9.name: MOP accepted VD
9.description: The payment will be routed to …

10.name: MOP Identifier
10.description: The settlement account of the MOP will be credited.  In the outgoing SWIFT message that will be sent through this MOP block 1 will be populated with the office identifier (BIC).

11.name: ACK/Confirmation
11.description: Message is sent to Wait confirmation Q/ Wait ACK

12.name: ACK/Confirmation
12.description: Message is sent to Complete Q

13.name: ACK/Confirmation
13.description: The referred payment is sent to Complete Q

14.name: ACK/Confirmation
14.description: The referred payment is sent to Complete Q

15.name: ACK/Confirmation
15.description: Message is sent to NAK Q for manual resolution

16.name: ACK/Confirmation
16.description: Message is sent to NAK Q for manual resolution

17.name: ACK/Confirmation
17.description: The rejection code / reason from MT019/NAK is displayed as part of the message details. (when user open the original message)

18.name: ACK/Confirmation
18.description: Un-matched MT012/019 go to Service Release Q.

19.name: ACK/Confirmation
19.description: An authorized user may perform the following  actions in the designated queue:  Force ACK, Force NAK, Resend

20.name: SSI
20.description: The Bene Bank"s SSI in the payment's currency will be added to the chain.

21.name: Country preferred correspondent
21.description: The bank"s Country Level correspondent of the 1st in Cr chain's country will be added to the chain.

22.name: Currency preferred correspondent
22.description: The bank"s Currency Level correspondent of the payment will be added to the chain.

23.name: Bank’s own correspondent
23.description: The bank"s specific Correspondent will be selected.

24.name: Bank Routing
24.description: Message is sent to repair and user can set a valid correspondent manually

25.name: Transfer method
25.description: Transfer method will be set as Serial or Cover

26.name: Transfer method
26.description: The payment will be sent as serial - the default of the system

27.name: Transfer method
27.description: The transfer method will be set as serial - default in the code.

28.name: Transfer method
28.description: The transfer method can be defined not according to the above logic

29.name: Transfer method
29.description: The payment will be sent serially

30.name: Transfer method
30.description: The payment will be routed to REPAIR
